name: All
description: Global poller and remediation executor for all detected issues.

name: Compromised User
description: Automated response for accounts confirmed as compromised.

name: Access from Anonymous IP
description: Alerts when a user authenticates from a known Tor exit node or anonymous proxy.

name: Access from Public VPN
description: Monitors authentication attempts coming from public VPN providers.

name: Access from Unauthorized Countries
description: Triggers when access is detected from a country not on the approved list.

name: Access to Anonymous IP
description: Identifies outbound traffic from internal assets to anonymous IP addresses.

name: Access to Public VPN
description: Identifies outbound traffic to known VPN service endpoints.

name: Access to Unauthorized Countries
description: Monitors outbound connections to assets in restricted geographic regions.

name: Auth Hash Quality
description: Analyzes the strength and algorithm of captured authentication hashes.

name: Auth Hash Security
description: Detects insecure hash storage or transmission patterns.

name: Auth Protocol Quality
description: Monitors the use of weak or deprecated authentication protocols (e.g., NTLMv1).

name: Compromised Password
description: Triggers when a password used by an identity is found in known data breaches.

name: Deviation in Daily Asset Activity
description: Alerts on significant changes in an asset's normal baseline behavior.

name: Enumeration of AD Admins
description: Detects attempts to enumerate members of sensitive Active Directory groups.

name: Enumeration of AD Users
description: Identifies scanning behavior aimed at discovering Active Directory accounts.

name: Exposed Assets
description: Monitors for internal assets that have become accidentally exposed to the public internet.

name: Lack of MFA
description: Generic alert for identities or assets operating without multi-factor authentication.

name: Identity No MFA
description: Specifically targets users who have not enrolled in or are not using MFA.

name: Asset No MFA
description: Identifies administrative access to assets that did not require MFA.

name: Repeated AD Login Attempts at Invalid Time
description: Alerts on brute-force patterns outside of normal business hours.

name: Repeated Login Attempts at Invalid Device
description: Detects multiple failed logins from a previously unseen or unauthorized device.

name: Shadow Access
description: Identifies undocumented or 'hidden' access paths to sensitive data.

name: Shadow Assets
description: Discovers assets that are active on the network but missing from the inventory.

name: Shadow Identity Systems
description: Detects unauthorized or standalone identity providers (IdPs) in the environment.

name: Suspected AD NTLM Relay Attack
description: Identifies patterns indicative of an NTLM relay attempt against Active Directory.

name: Suspected Attack on Disabled AD Account
description: Alerts when authentication attempts are made against a disabled account.

name: Suspected Attack on Expired AD Account
description: Alerts when authentication attempts are made against an expired account.

name: Suspected Attack on Locked AD Account
description: Alerts when authentication attempts are made against a locked account.

name: Suspected AD Brute-force Attack
description: Detects high-volume failed authentication attempts against Active Directory.

name: Suspected Identity Brute-force Attack
description: Detects high-volume failed login attempts against a specific user identity.

name: Suspected Directory/IdP Bot Attack
description: Identifies automated, non-human login patterns against identity systems.

name: Suspected Directory/IdP Password Spray Attack
description: Detects low-and-slow authentication attempts across many accounts.

name: Suspicious Inbound Access
description: Alerts on unusual incoming connections to sensitive internal resources.

name: Suspicious Outbound Access
description: Alerts on unusual outgoing connections from internal assets to the internet.

name: Unauthorized Asset Access
description: Detects access to a restricted asset by a user without proper permissions.

name: Unknown SaaS Access
description: Identifies use of SaaS applications that are not approved or monitored.

name: Weak Password
description: Triggers when an identity is found to be using a password that is easily guessable.

name: Unauthorized Identity Access
description: Alerts when an identity is used to access resources outside its normal scope.

name: Impossible Travel
description: Triggers when a user logs in from two geographically distant locations too quickly.

name: Suspected Access Token Sharing
description: Identifies potential session hijacking or token theft based on usage patterns.
